member.name: T:Microsoft.Dynamics.Commerce.Runtime.Configuration.CacheControlElement
member.summary: Represents configuration values used to control caching behavior.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Dynamics.Commerce.Runtime.Configuration.CacheControlElement.IsCachingDisabled
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether caching is disabled or not.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Dynamics.Commerce.Runtime.Configuration.CacheControlElement.IsCacheUpdatingDisabled
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether cache updates are allowed or not.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Dynamics.Commerce.Runtime.Configuration.CacheControlElement.ForceHostileCacheLookups
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether cache lookups should return the opposite of reality or not.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Dynamics.Commerce.Runtime.Configuration.CacheControlElement.ForceMissedCacheLookups
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether cache lookups should always fail or not.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Dynamics.Commerce.Runtime.Configuration.CacheControlElement.ForceCacheLookupHits
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether cache lookups should always return positive or not.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Dynamics.Commerce.Runtime.Configuration.RealtimeServiceElement
member.summary: Represents configuration values used for realtime service.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Dynamics.Commerce.Runtime.Configuration.RealtimeServiceElement.CertificateElement
member.summary: Gets the realtime service certificate settings.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Dynamics.Commerce.Runtime.Configuration.RealtimeServiceElement.Certificate
member.summary: Gets the certificate element.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Dynamics.Commerce.Runtime.Configuration.RealtimeServiceElement.ClientIdElement
member.summary: Gets the client identifier.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Dynamics.Commerce.Runtime.Configuration.RealtimeServiceElement.ClientId
member.summary: Gets the client identifier element.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Dynamics.Commerce.Runtime.Configuration.RealtimeServiceElement.ClientSecretsElement
member.summary: Gets the client secret collection.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Dynamics.Commerce.Runtime.Configuration.RealtimeServiceElement.ClientSecrets
member.summary: Gets the composition collection.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Dynamics.Commerce.Runtime.Configuration.RealtimeServiceElement.SettingsElementCollection
member.summary: Gets a generic key-value mapping of real-time service configurations to their values.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Dynamics.Commerce.Runtime.Configuration.RealtimeServiceElement.AuthenticationType
member.summary: Gets the authentication type to use with Real-time Service. Returns a null string if this configuration is not found in the Settings element.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Dynamics.Commerce.Runtime.Configuration.RealtimeServiceElement.ServiceName
member.summary: Gets the Service Name to attempt to contact using Real-time Service. Returns a null string if this configuration is not found in the Settings element.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Dynamics.Commerce.Runtime.Configuration.RealtimeServiceElement.ServiceHostUrl
member.summary: Gets the Service Host URL to attempt to reach using with Real-time Service. Returns a null string if this configuration is not found in the Settings element.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Dynamics.Commerce.Runtime.Configuration.RealtimeServiceElement.ProfileId
member.summary: Gets the RTS profile ID to use with Real-time Service. Returns a null string if this configuration is not found in the Settings element.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Dynamics.Commerce.Runtime.Configuration.RealtimeServiceElement.UserId
member.summary: Gets the user ID to use with certificate authentication. Returns a null string if this configuration is not found in the Settings element.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Dynamics.Commerce.Runtime.Configuration.RealtimeServiceElement.IssuerUri
member.summary: Gets the issuer URI to use with certificate authentication. Returns a null string if this configuration is not found in the Settings element.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Dynamics.Commerce.Runtime.Configuration.RealtimeServiceElement.IdentityProvider
member.summary: Gets the identity provider to use with certificate authentication. Returns a null string if this configuration is not found in the Settings element.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Dynamics.Commerce.Runtime.Configuration.RealtimeServiceElement.IdentityProviderClaim
member.summary: Gets the identity provider claim to use with certificate authentication. Returns a null string if this configuration is not found in the Settings element.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Dynamics.Commerce.Runtime.Configuration.RealtimeServiceElement.IssuedTokenType
member.summary: Gets the issued token type to use with certificate authentication. Returns a null string if this configuration is not found in the Settings element.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Dynamics.Commerce.Runtime.Configuration.RealtimeServiceElement.AudienceUrn
member.summary: Gets the audience URN to use with certificate authentication. Returns a null string if this configuration is not found in the Settings element.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Dynamics.Commerce.Runtime.Configuration.RealtimeServiceElement.AzureAuthority
member.summary: Gets the Azure authority to use with Service-to-Service authentication. Returns a null string if this configuration is not found in the Settings element.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Dynamics.Commerce.Runtime.Configuration.RealtimeServiceElement.AzureResource
member.summary: Gets the Azure resource to use with Service-to-Service authentication. Returns a null string if this configuration is not found in the Settings element.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Dynamics.Commerce.Runtime.Configuration.RealtimeServiceElement.CertificateAuthBindingName
member.summary: Gets the certificate authentication binding name to use with certificate authentication. Returns a null string if this configuration is not found in the Settings element.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Dynamics.Commerce.Runtime.Configuration.RealtimeServiceElement.ServicetoServiceAuthBindingName
member.summary: Gets the Service-To-Service authentication binding name to use with Service-to-Service authentication. Returns a null string if this configuration is not found in the Settings element.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Dynamics.Commerce.Runtime.Configuration.RealtimeServiceElement.MaxExtensionTimeoutInSeconds
member.summary: Gets the max allowed timeout setting for extension methods. Returns a null string if this configuration is not found in the setting element.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Dynamics.Commerce.Runtime.Configuration.RealtimeServiceElement.Settings
member.summary: Gets a generic key-value mapping of real-time service configurations to their values. This accessor is private to enforce its use through statically defined methods, which expose predefined known configuration values.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Dynamics.Commerce.Runtime.Configuration.StorageElement
member.summary: Represents configuration values used in conjunction with storage resolution.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Dynamics.Commerce.Runtime.Configuration.StorageElement.DefaultOperatingUnitNumber
member.summary: Gets the default operating unit for the StorageResolver class.
member.remarks: The operating unit used during storage resolution when no channel has been specified as part of the context. This should only be used during bootstrapping scenarios where the target channel is not yet available.
